document.full_text: bubble wrap maker sealed air corp  said it will buy privately held cleaning products maker diversey holdings for $2.9 billion in cash and stock, to enter the $40 billion-plus chemical cleaning and hygiene industry.
document.title: sealed air eyes cleaning market with $2.9 billion diversey buy
